name: barrel extension
description: A longer barrel increases the muzzle velocity of a firearm, contributing to both accuracy and damage but reduces portability and slows aiming.

name: rifled barrel
description: Rifling a shotgun barrel is mainly done in order to improve its accuracy when firing slugs.  The rifling makes the gun less suitable for shot, however.

name: shortened barrel
description: A shortened barrel results in markedly reduced accuracy, and a minor increase in noise, but also greatly improves the ease with which the weapon can be carried and wielded.

name: upstest
description: Testmod for UPS drain on mods, this should never spawn, if you see this, it's a bug. 50 UPS drain.

name: LW barrel extension
description: A Leadworks built in longer barrel increases the muzzle velocity of a firearm, contributing to both accuracy and damage, but slows aiming.

name: LW shortened barrel
description: A Leadworks built in shortened barrel results in reduced weapon range, and a minor increase in noise, but also greatly improves the ease with which the weapon can be carried and wielded.

name: LW heavy duty barrel
description: A Leadworks built in heavy duty barrel especially designed for prolonged shooting.  Reduced accuracy but increase damage output and weapon range.
